title: This phone costs less than AirPods! - POCO M5s
description: Check out Secret Lab chairs at:   POCO has been making great budget phones for years now and their latest M5s looks to continue the trend of shaking up the flagship space. Bell's here to see if the M5  is worth checking out or if the price tag is too good to be true.  Buy a POCO M5s:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE:    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 But how?! 0:24 The loot box 0:56 Unboxing 1:34 Design, buttons, ports, and cameras 4:45 Sponsor - Secret Lab 5:06 Display, specs, fingerprint scanner, and bloatware 7:28 Speaker impressions  7:56 Camera testing 10:16 Gaming and battery life 11:20 Missing features, pricing, competitors, and overall thoughts 12:59 Outro
